title: The Brightest Fell
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NaCIEt

by ann2who

For the past two years, Steve had never believed him when Tony had told him about his true identity. That he was, in fact, not just ‘Lucifer Morningstar’, but the actual ruler of Hell.
No matter how often Tony had explained that he never lied, not ever, no matter how painstakingly clear the evidence had been at times, Steve had somehow always found a way to pass it all as jokes, delusions—or just strange coincidences.
Truth, it seemed, was easy to overlook in the face of its overwhelming simplicity.
Now though, even Steve wouldn’t be able to ignore it any longer.
Who Tony was. Who he really was.
Samael. Satan. The Prince of Darkness.

summary: The Avengers Read Thirst Tweets
title: The Avengers Read Thirst Tweets
body:
Summary: The Avengers were told that doing this video would be good press, but considering that Peter Parker is the only one who has actually read a thirst tweet before, most of them are in way over their heads.

Warnings: Some mostly tame thirst tweets, occasional swearing

A/N: This is just a silly little project I got inspired to write a few days ago, and it’s been nothing but fun to write and find thirst tweets for! I may do a few more related fics, just because the range of buzzfeed content is so wide and enjoyable, and a lot of the marvel characters being put in strange situations is always so funny to me. Also, a special thank you to @buckthegrump, @spideywhiteys, and @johnmulaneyslut for those thirsty suggestions y’all sent me, they were a big help!

Masterlist

—

Tony had insisted it would be good press. That was, quite literally, the only reason any of them were doing this. Well, aside from Peter. He was doing this because Ned had practically bullied him into it.

“So we just…” Steve furrowed his brow in confusion, looking to the young woman behind the camera who had cheerfully introduced herself as Kirsten. She couldn’t have been more than twenty three, if his guess wasn’t incorrect, but he was more focused on the fact that her hair was a deep shade of purple. “Read it? Out loud?”

“Mhmm,” she hummed through pierced lips. “Just grab one out of your bucket and read it when it’s your turn.”

He hesitated, looking between her and another young woman named Brittany, the video producer for this whole thing; her hair wasn’t purple, but her arms were covered in tattoos. “But, so… what if it says something…?”

At Steve’s side, Tony rolled his eyes, highly aware of the fact that the camera was rolling and playing his actions up for dramatic effect, absolute diva that he was. “Come on, Rogers, you’re not that old. Let me demonstrate for you.” He quickly plucked a folded scrap of paper out of the bucket marked ‘Iron Man’ and opened it, beginning to read it out loud without first giving it a cautionary scan.

That had been a mistake.

“‘Tony Stark could convert my vagina into a storage facility for his antique stopwatch collection if that’s what he wanted to do with it.’”

It wasn’t often that Tony was rendered speechless or red faced, but this moment was one of the few. Villains might’ve been one evil he was accustomed to fighting; young people on the internet were a completely different situation.

At his side, Steve had burst into the loudest fit of shocked laughter he had given since being thawed out. “O-okay,” Steve gasped, “I think… aha, I think I understand the gist of it now, holy…”

Tony blinked, trying to regain his composure. The tone for this video had definitely just been set.

—

Bucky peered sideways at Sam and tried to hide his snickering. “I don’t think… this one’s probably not a good idea.”

Sam only leaned his face close to Bucky’s and sent him a shit eating, provoking sort of look; Brittany knew that look. It was the one Josh, another video producer, gave her after eating the lunch she had clearly marked with her name in the employee refrigerator. “Are you scared? You’re gonna let teenage girls on the internet scare you, bitch baby?”

And, well. Bucky was never one to back down from a challenge, especially not when it came to sticking it to Sam.

“‘Not to be That Bitch,’ which is trademarked for some reason” he began, already knowing he was going to regret the sentence as soon as he finished, “‘but I want Bucky Barnes to choke me to death with his thighs.’” There was no helping the strain in his voice as he looked up to see the two girls behind the camera hiding their giggles behind hands pressed to their mouths. And, just because Bucky wasn’t one to pass up an opportunity, he stared directly into the lens, dropped a wink, and said, “For future reference, I am an assassin and you can hire me.”

No one would be able to see it until the video went live on YouTube two days later, but the camera zoomed into Sam’s face at that exact moment, his eyes widening as he stared at Bucky in shock and mouthed, ‘What the fuck, man?’

—

“‘I don’t even know how, but I want to suck on Thor’s arms.’” Thor looked up at the camera, furrowing his brow in confusion. “What do you mean, you don’t know how? The anatomy is quite simple. We would just need to figure out a way for your jaw to—“

“My turn,” Bruce interrupted, hurriedly attempting to stop whatever explanation Thor was about to come up with. It wouldn’t have been much of an issue if he didn’t know it was going to end up in a demonstration that he was going to be expected to participate in. He plucked a paper from his jar, aptly labeled ‘Hulk Smash’ in bad sharpie, and quickly read it out loud. “‘Honestly? I’d let Hulk smash me. Sexually or to pieces, I don’t have a preference.’” And, looking at the camera, he couldn’t do much but stutter out, “You really… should? Have a preference? You really should.”

Thor smiled brightly, gesturing to himself. “My preference would be sexually.”

“‘Course it is,” Bruce muttered, raising his eyes to the ceiling and ignoring the looks he was getting from the videographer. “Of course it is.”

—

“You got these off the internet?” Wanda questioned, eyebrows practically raising into her hairline. “Like, from real people? Real people wrote these?”

Peter Parker raised his eyebrows, giving Wanda an incredulous look. “Why do you find that so hard to believe?”

“Because this says ‘I want Scarlet Witch to run me over with her car and use my crumpled corpse as an inexpensive throw blanket.’” She paused for her words to sink in, but Peter’s expression remained nonplussed, meaning she was forced to explain. “Doesn’t really seem like something a real person would write, does it?”

“Wanda, how old are you?”

She shrugged a shoulder as the camera focused on her face, not sure of what that had to do with anything. “Uh, I don’t know, it’s kind of unclear. Let’s go with, like, twenty?”

The look on Peter’s face was comically sympathetic. “Remind me to show you some memes when we get home.”

—

“I don’t wanna read this one,” Steve stated, locking eyes pleadingly with Kirsten the camera girl. “Please don’t make me read this one.”

“I’ll read it then!” Tony exclaimed, snatching the paper from Steve’s fingers. Steve yelled, pleading, begging for him to stop, just think about his actions for once in his fucking life, but it was to no avail. Tony Stark was fucking merciless. “‘Steve Rogers with his dirty fucking beard is actually daddy as fuck.’”

“I’m shaving it as soon as I get home,” Steve whispered lowly in a sad promise to himself. “As soon as I get home.”

“Aw, Cap,” Tony teased, giving him a pat on the back. “But then you won’t be daddy anymore!”

Not that Steve could see it in that moment, but it was then that Kirsten made sure to zoom the camera in uncomfortably close to Steve’s face, focusing just before whispering, “Fuck you, Tony. Fuck you.”

—

“This is embarrassing,” Peter muttered under his breath, looking to Wanda for solace. “If I read this out loud MJ is never gonna let me hear the end of it.”

“You’re barking up the wrong tree for sympathy, kid,” Wanda told him, wearing a merciless expression as she raised her brows. “I’m supposed to be using someone’s corpse as a blanket, remember?”

Peter sighed, figuring it was better to just bite the bullet.

“‘I want… I want Spiderman to rip me in half.’”

A few moments of silence passed between everyone on the room before Brittany shrugged a shoulder. “That’s honestly probably the most tame one we’ve heard all day.”

“Oh,” Peter responded, pleasantly surprised. “Okay, well I guess we can do another then, right?” He shrugged off the last and grabbed another scrap of paper, opening it up and proceeding to read. “‘I’d let Spiderman use his webs to—‘“ He cut himself off in a startled shriek, shaking his head profusely and throwing the scrap of paper as fast and hard as he could away from himself. “You guys are so lucky I’m not in high school anymore, I am not reading any more of these!”

Peter sincerely wished Buzzfeed had asked him to do the dog interviews instead. He fucking loved the dog interviews.

—

Sam grinned widely, looking much like a toddler on Christmas morning. “Oh, this is what I’m talking about,” he announced, clearing his throat before going on to read the tweet in his hands. “‘Sam Wilson could walk up to me and punch me in the face for no reason, and honestly? I’d apologize to him.’ I mean I would never punch a fan of the Falcon, you know what I’m saying? The Buck man here doesn’t have quite as many manners so I can’t speak for him.”

Bucky flipped Sam the bird not so subtly, and Brittany made a mental note to edit that out with a pixel effect later. Not because it was required, just because it would be fucking hilarious to watch.

“Hustle up, guy,” Sam egged his friend on as Bucky reached into his container of paper slips with a metal hand. “Let’s go, let’s go, let’s go!”

Bucky read the slip, then snorted. Actually snorted, proceeded by an embarrassed facial expression and all. This only made Sam laugh harder, and as Bucky allowed the other man to read the tweet, he progressed to outright raucous behavior. Brittany and Kirsten hesitated, sharing confused, mildly worried expressions with one another.

“Okay okay,” Bucky giggled — fucking giggled — between fits. “This says… haha, uh… fucking, ‘Y’all can…’” He broke his words, unable to keep from laughing as Sam nudged him in the ribs. Eventually, he became composed enough to try again. “‘Y’all can thirst after Thor all you want, give me that Bucky with the good arm and tiny waist.’ The good… the good arm, I can’t…”

“Which arm is the good one?” Sam cackled, wiping tears from his eyes. “Which one is the good one, Bucky?”

Kirsten leaned over to Brittany to whisper, “This is gonna get so many views, dude.”

Brittany nodded, shaking her head in captivation. She’d known these people were a little out there, but god damn if the Avengers weren’t some of the weirdest fucking people she had ever been tasked to produce videos on.

—

Warnings: Some mostly tame thirst tweets, occasional swearing

A/N: This is just a silly little project I got inspired to write a few days ago, and it’s been nothing but fun to write and find thirst tweets for! I may do a few more related fics, just because the range of buzzfeed content is so wide and enjoyable, and a lot of the marvel characters being put in strange situations is always so funny to me. Also, a special thank you to @buckthegrump, @spideywhiteys, and @johnmulaneyslut for those thirsty suggestions y’all sent me, they were a big help!

Masterlist

—

Tony had insisted it would be good press. That was, quite literally, the only reason any of them were doing this. Well, aside from Peter. He was doing this because Ned had practically bullied him into it.

“So we just…” Steve furrowed his brow in confusion, looking to the young woman behind the camera who had cheerfully introduced herself as Kirsten. She couldn’t have been more than twenty three, if his guess wasn’t incorrect, but he was more focused on the fact that her hair was a deep shade of purple. “Read it? Out loud?”

“Mhmm,” she hummed through pierced lips. “Just grab one out of your bucket and read it when it’s your turn.”

Summary: The Avengers were told that doing this video would be good press, but considering that Peter Parker is the only one who has actually read a thirst tweet before, most of them are in way over their heads.

Warnings: Some mostly tame thirst tweets, occasional swearing

A/N: This is just a silly little project I got inspired to write a few days ago, and it’s been nothing but fun to write and find thirst tweets for! I may do a few more related fics, just because the range of buzzfeed content is so wide and enjoyable, and a lot of the marvel characters being put in strange situations is always so funny to me. Also, a special thank you to @buckthegrump, @spideywhiteys, and @johnmulaneyslut for those thirsty suggestions y’all sent me, they were a big help!

Masterlist

—

Tony had insisted it would be good press. That was, quite literally, the only reason any of them were doing this. Well, aside from Peter. He was doing this because Ned had practically bullied him into it.

“So we just…” Steve furrowed his brow in confusion, looking to the young woman behind the camera who had cheerfully introduced herself as Kirsten. She couldn’t have been more than twenty three, if his guess wasn’t incorrect, but he was more focused on the fact that her hair was a deep shade of purple. “Read it? Out loud?”

“Mhmm,” she hummed through pierced lips. “Just grab one out of your bucket and read it when it’s your turn.”

[[MORE]]

He hesitated, looking between her and another young woman named Brittany, the video producer for this whole thing; her hair wasn’t purple, but her arms were covered in tattoos. “But, so… what if it says something…?”

At Steve’s side, Tony rolled his eyes, highly aware of the fact that the camera was rolling and playing his actions up for dramatic effect, absolute diva that he was. “Come on, Rogers, you’re not that old. Let me demonstrate for you.” He quickly plucked a folded scrap of paper out of the bucket marked ‘Iron Man’ and opened it, beginning to read it out loud without first giving it a cautionary scan.

That had been a mistake.

“‘Tony Stark could convert my vagina into a storage facility for his antique stopwatch collection if that’s what he wanted to do with it.’”

It wasn’t often that Tony was rendered speechless or red faced, but this moment was one of the few. Villains might’ve been one evil he was accustomed to fighting; young people on the internet were a completely different situation.

At his side, Steve had burst into the loudest fit of shocked laughter he had given since being thawed out. “O-okay,” Steve gasped, “I think… aha, I think I understand the gist of it now, holy…”

Tony blinked, trying to regain his composure. The tone for this video had definitely just been set.

—

Bucky peered sideways at Sam and tried to hide his snickering. “I don’t think… this one’s probably not a good idea.”

Sam only leaned his face close to Bucky’s and sent him a shit eating, provoking sort of look; Brittany knew that look. It was the one Josh, another video producer, gave her after eating the lunch she had clearly marked with her name in the employee refrigerator. “Are you scared? You’re gonna let teenage girls on the internet scare you, bitch baby?”

And, well. Bucky was never one to back down from a challenge, especially not when it came to sticking it to Sam.

“‘Not to be That Bitch,’ which is trademarked for some reason” he began, already knowing he was going to regret the sentence as soon as he finished, “‘but I want Bucky Barnes to choke me to death with his thighs.’” There was no helping the strain in his voice as he looked up to see the two girls behind the camera hiding their giggles behind hands pressed to their mouths. And, just because Bucky wasn’t one to pass up an opportunity, he stared directly into the lens, dropped a wink, and said, “For future reference, I am an assassin and you can hire me.”

No one would be able to see it until the video went live on YouTube two days later, but the camera zoomed into Sam’s face at that exact moment, his eyes widening as he stared at Bucky in shock and mouthed, ‘What the fuck, man?’

—

“‘I don’t even know how, but I want to suck on Thor’s arms.’” Thor looked up at the camera, furrowing his brow in confusion. “What do you mean, you don’t know how? The anatomy is quite simple. We would just need to figure out a way for your jaw to—“

“My turn,” Bruce interrupted, hurriedly attempting to stop whatever explanation Thor was about to come up with. It wouldn’t have been much of an issue if he didn’t know it was going to end up in a demonstration that he was going to be expected to participate in. He plucked a paper from his jar, aptly labeled ‘Hulk Smash’ in bad sharpie, and quickly read it out loud. “‘Honestly? I’d let Hulk smash me. Sexually or to pieces, I don’t have a preference.’” And, looking at the camera, he couldn’t do much but stutter out, “You really… should? Have a preference? You really should.”

Thor smiled brightly, gesturing to himself. “My preference would be sexually.”

“‘Course it is,” Bruce muttered, raising his eyes to the ceiling and ignoring the looks he was getting from the videographer. “Of course it is.”

—

“You got these off the internet?” Wanda questioned, eyebrows practically raising into her hairline. “Like, from real people? Real people wrote these?”

Peter Parker raised his eyebrows, giving Wanda an incredulous look. “Why do you find that so hard to believe?”

“Because this says ‘I want Scarlet Witch to run me over with her car and use my crumpled corpse as an inexpensive throw blanket.’” She paused for her words to sink in, but Peter’s expression remained nonplussed, meaning she was forced to explain. “Doesn’t really seem like something a real person would write, does it?”

“Wanda, how old are you?”

She shrugged a shoulder as the camera focused on her face, not sure of what that had to do with anything. “Uh, I don’t know, it’s kind of unclear. Let’s go with, like, twenty?”

The look on Peter’s face was comically sympathetic. “Remind me to show you some memes when we get home.”

—

“I don’t wanna read this one,” Steve stated, locking eyes pleadingly with Kirsten the camera girl. “Please don’t make me read this one.”

“I’ll read it then!” Tony exclaimed, snatching the paper from Steve’s fingers. Steve yelled, pleading, begging for him to stop, just think about his actions for once in his fucking life, but it was to no avail. Tony Stark was fucking merciless. “‘Steve Rogers with his dirty fucking beard is actually daddy as fuck.’”

“I’m shaving it as soon as I get home,” Steve whispered lowly in a sad promise to himself. “As soon as I get home.”

“Aw, Cap,” Tony teased, giving him a pat on the back. “But then you won’t be daddy anymore!”

Not that Steve could see it in that moment, but it was then that Kirsten made sure to zoom the camera in uncomfortably close to Steve’s face, focusing just before whispering, “Fuck you, Tony. Fuck you.”

—

“This is embarrassing,” Peter muttered under his breath, looking to Wanda for solace. “If I read this out loud MJ is never gonna let me hear the end of it.”

“You’re barking up the wrong tree for sympathy, kid,” Wanda told him, wearing a merciless expression as she raised her brows. “I’m supposed to be using someone’s corpse as a blanket, remember?”

Peter sighed, figuring it was better to just bite the bullet.

“‘I want… I want Spiderman to rip me in half.’”

A few moments of silence passed between everyone on the room before Brittany shrugged a shoulder. “That’s honestly probably the most tame one we’ve heard all day.”

“Oh,” Peter responded, pleasantly surprised. “Okay, well I guess we can do another then, right?” He shrugged off the last and grabbed another scrap of paper, opening it up and proceeding to read. “‘I’d let Spiderman use his webs to—‘“ He cut himself off in a startled shriek, shaking his head profusely and throwing the scrap of paper as fast and hard as he could away from himself. “You guys are so lucky I’m not in high school anymore, I am not reading any more of these!”

Peter sincerely wished Buzzfeed had asked him to do the dog interviews instead. He fucking loved the dog interviews.

—

Sam grinned widely, looking much like a toddler on Christmas morning. “Oh, this is what I’m talking about,” he announced, clearing his throat before going on to read the tweet in his hands. “‘Sam Wilson could walk up to me and punch me in the face for no reason, and honestly? I’d apologize to him.’ I mean I would never punch a fan of the Falcon, you know what I’m saying? The Buck man here doesn’t have quite as many manners so I can’t speak for him.”

Bucky flipped Sam the bird not so subtly, and Brittany made a mental note to edit that out with a pixel effect later. Not because it was required, just because it would be fucking hilarious to watch.

“Hustle up, guy,” Sam egged his friend on as Bucky reached into his container of paper slips with a metal hand. “Let’s go, let’s go, let’s go!”

Bucky read the slip, then snorted. Actually snorted, proceeded by an embarrassed facial expression and all. This only made Sam laugh harder, and as Bucky allowed the other man to read the tweet, he progressed to outright raucous behavior. Brittany and Kirsten hesitated, sharing confused, mildly worried expressions with one another.

“Okay okay,” Bucky giggled — fucking giggled — between fits. “This says… haha, uh… fucking, ‘Y’all can…’” He broke his words, unable to keep from laughing as Sam nudged him in the ribs. Eventually, he became composed enough to try again. “‘Y’all can thirst after Thor all you want, give me that Bucky with the good arm and tiny waist.’ The good… the good arm, I can’t…”

“Which arm is the good one?” Sam cackled, wiping tears from his eyes. “Which one is the good one, Bucky?”

Kirsten leaned over to Brittany to whisper, “This is gonna get so many views, dude.”

Brittany nodded, shaking her head in captivation. She’d known these people were a little out there, but god damn if the Avengers weren’t some of the weirdest fucking people she had ever been tasked to produce videos on.

—

The look on Peter’s face was comically sympathetic. “Remind me to show you some memes when we get home.”

—

“I don’t wanna read this one,” Steve stated, locking eyes pleadingly with Kirsten the camera girl. “Please don’t make me read this one.”

“I’ll read it then!” Tony exclaimed, snatching the paper from Steve’s fingers. Steve yelled, pleading, begging for him to stop, just think about his actions for once in his fucking life, but it was to no avail. Tony Stark was fucking merciless. “‘Steve Rogers with his dirty fucking beard is actually daddy as fuck.’”

“I’m shaving it as soon as I get home,” Steve whispered lowly in a sad promise to himself. “As soon as I get home.”

“Aw, Cap,” Tony teased, giving him a pat on the back. “But then you won’t be daddy anymore!”

Not that Steve could see it in that moment, but it was then that Kirsten made sure to zoom the camera in uncomfortably close to Steve’s face, focusing just before whispering, “Fuck you, Tony. Fuck you.”

—

“This is embarrassing,” Peter muttered under his breath, looking to Wanda for solace. “If I read this out loud MJ is never gonna let me hear the end of it.”

“You’re barking up the wrong tree for sympathy, kid,” Wanda told him, wearing a merciless expression as she raised her brows. “I’m supposed to be using someone’s corpse as a blanket, remember?”

Peter sighed, figuring it was better to just bite the bullet.

“‘I want… I want Spiderman to rip me in half.’”

A few moments of silence passed between everyone on the room before Brittany shrugged a shoulder. “That’s honestly probably the most tame one we’ve heard all day.”

“Oh,” Peter responded, pleasantly surprised. “Okay, well I guess we can do another then, right?” He shrugged off the last and grabbed another scrap of paper, opening it up and proceeding to read. “‘I’d let Spiderman use his webs to—‘“ He cut himself off in a startled shriek, shaking his head profusely and throwing the scrap of paper as fast and hard as he could away from himself. “You guys are so lucky I’m not in high school anymore, I am not reading any more of these!”

Peter sincerely wished Buzzfeed had asked him to do the dog interviews instead. He fucking loved the dog interviews.

—

Sam grinned widely, looking much like a toddler on Christmas morning. “Oh, this is what I’m talking about,” he announced, clearing his throat before going on to read the tweet in his hands. “‘Sam Wilson could walk up to me and punch me in the face for no reason, and honestly? I’d apologize to him.’ I mean I would never punch a fan of the Falcon, you know what I’m saying? The Buck man here doesn’t have quite as many manners so I can’t speak for him.”

Bucky flipped Sam the bird not so subtly, and Brittany made a mental note to edit that out with a pixel effect later. Not because it was required, just because it would be fucking hilarious to watch.

“Hustle up, guy,” Sam egged his friend on as Bucky reached into his container of paper slips with a metal hand. “Let’s go, let’s go, let’s go!”

Bucky read the slip, then snorted. Actually snorted, proceeded by an embarrassed facial expression and all. This only made Sam laugh harder, and as Bucky allowed the other man to read the tweet, he progressed to outright raucous behavior. Brittany and Kirsten hesitated, sharing confused, mildly worried expressions with one another.

“Okay okay,” Bucky giggled — fucking giggled — between fits. “This says… haha, uh… fucking, ‘Y’all can…’” He broke his words, unable to keep from laughing as Sam nudged him in the ribs. Eventually, he became composed enough to try again. “‘Y’all can thirst after Thor all you want, give me that Bucky with the good arm and tiny waist.’ The good… the good arm, I can’t…”

“Which arm is the good one?” Sam cackled, wiping tears from his eyes. “Which one is the good one, Bucky?”

Kirsten leaned over to Brittany to whisper, “This is gonna get so many views, dude.”

Brittany nodded, shaking her head in captivation. She’d known these people were a little out there, but god damn if the Avengers weren’t some of the weirdest fucking people she had ever been tasked to produce videos on.

—

trail.content_abstract:
Summary: The Avengers were told that doing this video would be good press, but considering that Peter Parker is the only one who has actually read a thirst tweet before, most of them are in way over their heads.

Warnings: Some mostly tame thirst tweets, occasional swearing

A/N: This is just a silly little project I got inspired to write a few days ago, and it’s been nothing but fun to write and find thirst tweets for! I may do a few more related fics, just because the range of buzzfeed content is so wide and enjoyable, and a lot of the marvel characters being put in strange situations is always so funny to me. Also, a special thank you to @buckthegrump, @spideywhiteys, and @johnmulaneyslut for those thirsty suggestions y’all sent me, they were a big help!

Masterlist

—

Tony had insisted it would be good press. That was, quite literally, the only reason any of them were doing this. Well, aside from Peter. He was doing this because Ned had practically bullied him into it.

“So we just…” Steve furrowed his brow in confusion, looking to the young woman behind the camera who had cheerfully introduced herself as Kirsten. She couldn’t have been more than twenty three, if his guess wasn’t incorrect, but he was more focused on the fact that her hair was a deep shade of purple. “Read it? Out loud?”

“Mhmm,” she hummed through pierced lips. “Just grab one out of your bucket and read it when it’s your turn.”

summary: so on your bruce hc post you asked for requests,, so here i am! maybe you could do a little thorbruce oneshot where you talk...
question: so on your bruce hc post you asked for requests,, so here i am! maybe you could do a little thorbruce oneshot where you talk about how affectionate bruce and thor are and they were practically dating before they got together?
answer:
aaa i’m shook. this is my first writing request absbs,, i hope you enjoy it !

It took Bruce a while to notice it. Thor had always been touchy and affectionate with him, and he didn’t think anything of it.

Thor would occasionally hold his hand, wrap an arm around him, or just plain old cuddle with him. Maybe even a kiss on the cheek when saying hello or goodbye. 

It wasn’t rare for the other avengers to find them basically attached to each other during movie night. In fact, that almost always happened. Sometimes Bruce would even fall asleep on Thor, and he would smile at Bruce for the rest of the night. 

To the others, it was obvious that Thor was in love with him. However, Bruce was completely oblivious.  

The first time Bruce did notice that there was something more there, they were getting coffee together. It was a weekly thing for them. They did it every Tuesday morning. They were sitting across from each other, hands laced on top of the table as they talked. 

They talked about many things on these little dates. Mostly just what was going on in their lives, or their interests. Bruce tended to ramble when he talked about stuff, but Thor listened to him and smiled all the while. 

Bruce paused in the middle of rambling, and looked down at their hands. He hadn’t noticed before, but Thor was idly rubbing his hand with his thumb. He stared for a few seconds before looking back at Thor, quickly shrugging it off.

Later, however, he questioned it, and began to overthink. He called Tony immediately. “Has… has Thor always been like this?” he asked as soon as Tony picked up.

“That depends, what do you mean?”

“I mean being super affectionate and cute around me. Today he held my hand and smiled at me like I was the whole world and I short circuited for a second.”

“Bruce, he literally kisses your cheek regularly. He’s been doing this for months. He’s literally in love with you.”

“I mean, we do cuddle sometimes and get coffee once a week, but- Oh my god, you’re right.”

“Like I’m ever wrong. It’s taken you this long to realize? Everyone knows.”

“Is he that obvious about it?”

Tony chuckled. “If only you could see him on movie nights.”

summary: Two Survivors - Thor&Tony
title: Two Survivors - Thor&Tony
body:
Hey @academicgangster!! Remember that old, old ask you sent me?? Because I asked for drawing ideas??? And I immediately had this idea from your prompt and then I took forEVER to draw this so here’s a really, really late one! 

Thor, thinking about his last blow that didn’t stop Thanos: …….

Thor, also thinking about his dead brother: …………….

Thor, also also thinking about the annihilation of his planet and people: ……………….

Thor, exhausted: **Deep Sigh**

Thor: **Don’t scream, don’t scream, don’t scream**

**Deep Inhale**

**Second, deeper sigh**

((Spaceship landing noise))

(and also under the cut)

Tony, simultaneously not trying to die and also not imagining his friends dying despite everything he’s done: ………….

Nebula: I don’t see anyone useful nearby. I’ll go a little further to see if anyone can actually help you to survive.

Tony, definitely not thinking about how he held Peter in his arms as he disintegrated, and most definitely not calculating probabilities on how many of his friends may have survived: …………………

Tony, both physically and emotionally exhausted: *Sigh* *collapse*

Nebula: Ugh, you’re so weak! Sit down, I’ll go find help by myself.

Nebula: Hey, you there! Don’t let him die!

Tony: ((Hello Darkness My Old Friend)) 

Tony: ((Death is that you that came to finally claim me??))

Thor: Tony…

Tony: ….. Thor…?

…………..

Thor: ….. move aside, friend.

Tony: ……. yeah, nice to see you again too, Point Break.

Thor: You’re shivering.

Tony: Blood loss will do that to you.

Thor:

Tony: 

Thor: ………. We’ll make it through.

Tony: ……….. Yeah. I….. We’ll fix it.

So this entire thing’s overall mood is just…. a constant, deep, sigh. I like it. Tell me what you think?

Also, I tagged Thor&Tony but I wouldn’t mind if someone tagged this as ThorxTony. It’s just overall very General so I kept it a &. There’s also nothing romantic happening, it’s just…. Two Very Tired People trying to keep it together in front of their friend. Because they each see that the other has gone through a LOT. Maybe each of them think the other deserves more sympathy than themselves. So they’re trying to be strong for each other.

summary: you know what I was thinking last night? what happened between Banner crushing in Wong and Stephen's home, and Stephen opening a...
body:
you know what I was thinking last night?

what happened between Banner crushing in Wong and Stephen’s home, and Stephen opening a portal to reach Tony.

Like, why wasn’t Bruce the one to step first to see Tony? why did they reach Tony instead of Cap or Fury? and oh it got me thinking.

Wong: so this Thanos is coming and he’s bad news?
Bruce: yes, we are going to need all the help that we can get.
Stephen: how about Tony Stark?
Bruce: Tony! yes! I’ll call him do you have a phone?
Stephen: no no, I got it. I’ll just open a portal to him.
Bruce: let me talk to him first, maybe a familiar face will–
Stephen: no, I’ll do the talk.
Bruce: but maybe he–
Stephen: I’ll talk we Tony! let me talk with Tony!
Bruce: …
Wong: …

I literally can not deal with the fact that Stephen already knew who tony was and the moment he got the opportunity to casually talk with him he immediately got it
